title: Bluey: Bob Bilby
description: Based on the hit ABC KIDS TV show!It’s Bingo’s turn to take Bob Bilby home. Will they have fun times?Bluey has been a phenomenal success since airing on ABC KIDS in October 2018, amassing legions of dedicated fans and taking the coveted position of being the most watched program ever on ABC iView, with over 170 million plays. It has also topped the Australian iTunes Kids Chart with the series peaking at #1 and consistently remaining in the Top 5.
author: Bluey
